text: Mateo Mendía dos Santos (Olavarría, Argentina, February 3, 2004) is an Argentine soccer player who plays as a defender for Boca Juniors in the Argentine Professional Football League. == Professional career == Mateo signed for Boca Juniors' youth team in 2023. He managed to win the 2023 U-20 Intercontinental, he played the 2024 U-20 Libertadores, in which he played 4 of the 5 matches, scoring a goal on the first game, and he reached the final of the cup against Flamengo U-20, in which Boca Juniors lost 2 to 1. He then joined the main squad, led by Diego Martínez. Mateo's debut in Boca's first team took place on May 19, 2024 in a league match against Central Córdoba, in a game where Boca Juniors won 4 to 2. == References == Category:Living people Category:2004 births Category:Argentine footballers
title: Mateo Mendía
